title: lol update failed stuck at 33% and 35%
body: my lo update failed at 33% and 35% it shows me eurrer update failed any help please help me

replies.body: ya, if I choose to rock out the updated client it puts me in an endless loop trying to repair and revert back to older version of patch.  When I choose to stay with older client, I get to 33 percent and at times 44 percent and gives me an "unexpected error has occurred" and I click retry brings me back to 33 percent and same issues.  Nothings wrong with my internet connection

What antivirus are you using?  You can have the prefect internet connection, but it doesn't make you immune from being blocked reaching specific servers.  At this step in your update, the patcher is connect to the patching servers but getting kicked off.  The steps in the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide should help towards resolve that.
i don't understand what i should do
and i'm using the ESET NOD32 antivirus

At 33% your patcher is done preparing game files for an update and is transitioning to our patching servers to download new files.  It seems like something with your network blocking that connection from being made.  For your specific issue, go over the steps in the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to troubleshoot.  That should get you connected and up to date!
